Countless children, many of whom are from poor and minority neighborhoods, have had no option when their schools fail them.

The grant would be funded by clawing back unspent $ from the nearly $130 billion that was appropriated for K-12 schools through ARPA to OPEN schools.

Since March 2020, K-12 schools have received almost $200 billion in COVID funding. What do these schools have to show for it?
Eligible tuition includes tuition to a private or parochial school, a neighboring public school, a public charter school, home-schooling, tutoring, or other forms of in-person learning.

My bill would provide up to $10,000 in a federal education grant to students whose local public school is closed to in-person learning.

The grant can be used for tuition for in-person schooling, transportation, school meals, or any other education-related expenses.
